body.name: Disposable Face Mask 4-Ply for Adult, Soft Face Masks, Breathable Safety Mask
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 19 hrs 5 mins
features: Fabric type 68% non-woven fabric, 30% meltblown fabric

4 Ply - High quality 4 ply, 3 non-woven fabric layers for the outer layers and one layer meltblown fabric inside. Adopting high quality material that is breathable and bring you a comfortable feeling. Skin friendly.
Comfortable - High effective to filter dust with its folding 4-tier process structure.
Easy to Use - Slip the elastic bands over your ears and press the metal strip around the bridge of your nose to create a light seal around your face.
Breathable -Fit for the face very well, inner skin-friendly non-woven fabric is soft and comfortable;

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GREEN IN ONE BOX 50pcs Green Masks The outer fabric is printed with soft material, comfortable and keep your health.

4 PLY 4 ply mask, one layer more than the normal disposable mask. 2 X Layer non-woven fabric 1 X Layer Meltblown fabric 1 X Layer inner soft non-woven fabric WIDER AND STURDIER EARBAND The earband is wider and sofer than the normal mask. SOFT AND SKIN-FRIENDLY All of the materials are tested and meet the standard before being manufactured. The inner non-woven fabric is soft to touch the skin.

50pcs Individually wrap Individually wrap Individually wrap Printed Mask Printed Mask color Green Multicolor Black Purple Tie dye Sky ASTM LEVEL 2 ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ No No Individually wrapped No ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Layers 4Ply 4Ply 4Ply 4Ply 3Ply 3Ply Qty / Box 50 50 50 50 50 50

PROFESSIONAL MANUFACTURER We specialized in R&D of the proffesional personal health products to our customers. The factory has more than 10 years of experience of manufacturing all kinds of hygienic products and our clients includs hospitals/medical research institutions etc. HIGH STANDARD DUSTLESS WORKSHOP All of the masks are produced in the high standard dustless workshop. This can make sure the masks are clean and not being polluted in the production process. PROFESSIONAL ENGINEERS AND MACHINES The professional machines can help the masks to meet all kinds of standards and testing. STRICT QUALITY INSPECTION The masks will be checked carefully again before they leave the factory. We have the same standard with the customs to make sure they meet the standard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the mask you’re looking for
reviews.reviewText: Extremely pleased with these. I am in outpatient healthcare and ordered these to try them out. I have nothing but positive things to day about these masks!1. The ear loops are a little thicker and have more cushion for behind the ears making it very comfortable to wear. Straps are secured very well to the mask which has been not the case with other surgical masks I’ve ordered.2. The strip for the nose conforms nicely and maintains shape extremely well.3. Definitely 4 ply. In case you were worried it wasn’t 4 ply, we compared them to the 3 ply surgical masks and cut a used one.4. Breathable. Easy to breathe, even in humidity outside. (A mask in humidity is never fun though regardless, but we’re doing our due diligence.5. Worth the money, this is less than you’d pay for other 4 ply masksI already put in an order for more as well as sent the link to multiple friends. This came in 4 days earlier than the original date it said it would.Overall more than pleased with the quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit well and soft
reviews.reviewText: Wear them when I go shopping

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Breathable and protective
reviews.reviewText: Best masks ever. Breathable yet durable. The same as the hospital masks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and comfortable, but slightly too large for me
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for 4-ply masks because my pre-pandemic masks that I loved are running out, and that listing on Amazon has been replaced by 3-ply masks that are not the same. I still like my old masks better, but these are pretty good replacements.I took off a star mostly because these masks are quite large, and the nose strip has too much fabric sticking up above it, rather than having the metal piece flush against the top of the mask. However, they are quite comfortable, have good breathability (much easier to breathe through than the common pastel blue masks), the ear loops are soft and stretchy, and the overall quality is very high. Plus it's a pretty green color, which is a plus.I found a video showing how to knot the ear loops to make masks smaller to fit better, and all the other masks I've tried that technique with have broken when doing that (the ear loops separate from the mask). In contrast, these masks are sturdy enough to do so without breaking.They arrived packaged together in sturdy plastic inside a box that you can use for storage and distribution. My shipment came fast and the box arrived in good condition. They are definitely manufactured in China, as the box (box version 2 in the description) states that the manufacturer is Guangzhou Fuzelong Hygiene Material Company, Ltd. in Guangzhou.These masks are a bit pricey, but you get good quality masks for the money. I recommend them, and in fact already have recommended them to my friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My experience, seems & feels like a quality mask.
reviews.reviewText: I don’t know very much about masks.First off, packaging is like #2 type, with all masks wrapped in a sealed plastic wrap. If you’re careful, you can cut a slit in the plastic wrap and use the box to house and dispense the masks ( the box is made that way). In the future, maybe the box could be thicker, and Amazon could care enough to ship them in a small box instead of a thinly padded envelope.Even though these are Chinese made, they feel as if they are of high quality. Good construction, nice fit from under the eyes to well under the chin. The sides feel as if they are touching my face all the way down.I work as an electrician and wastewater plant operator. Raw wastewater has the potential of having Covid-19 in it, from “off-shedding” of sick people. Therefore, so I can sleep at night, be together with my wife, and have a clear conscience, I wear a mask anytime I’m at work, or outside of my safe space in my truck. That being said, I want to be comfortable, and the mask to be as functional as possible. It’s not political, it’s the right thing to do, for others and myself. I really wish we could all get on the same sheet of music on this!Today, I worked in 90° sunshine replacing a pump, by myself. It was hot, but not unbearable. If you ever served in the Army, and wore a M17 rubber mask with a MOPP 4 charcoal suit, and rubber boots, you’ll understand what hot is. Just slow down, go stand in the shade for a few minutes, then go back to it, until you’re done. The alternative here, just isn’t good!One thing with ear loops: Tie a small knot about a 1/4” from one end or both ends to get a tighter fit. Also, to hang a mask below your face, make yourself a mask neck hanger from small alligator clips, attached to a couple of old ear loops, tied together and knotted through the end of each alligator clip. Then attach the alligator clips to the ear loops when not in use, or you’re away from everyone. I realize this is not 100% optimum, but it’s better than placing a used mask in your pocket to get dirty or contaminated, or not having a mask when you need it. Believe me, it will stay cleaner hanging down from your neck (well away from your face). Keep your mask hanger in your pocket, with a clip attached to a belt loop. That way you don’t lose your hanger!Good luck everyone. Peace ✌️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I need these for work. I can wear them all day and they are comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best kind to buy on Amazon
reviews.reviewText: I like that they are thicker than most sold on Amazon. The others are like napkins compared to these masks. Although they are not as thick as ones found in a medical clinic, but I would say for the price these are a better choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are definitely 4 ply. You can tell the difference if you’ve been using 3ply. They fit well on my face. I just wish they would do multiple colors. I would definitely buy again.
